# A Clojure version of "the most beautiful program ever written"
as described here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OyfBQmvr2Hc (here's an [image](https://camo.githubusercontent.) of the chez scheme code).


```bash
clj -i eval_expr.clj -e "(in-ns 'eval-expr)" -r
```

At the repl
```clojure
eval-expr=> (run-tests)

Testing eval-expr

Ran 1 tests containing 8 assertions.
0 failures, 0 errors.
{:test 1, :pass 8, :fail 0, :error 0, :type :summary}
```
